content: cab�� hat s�ay kni�� 1 cable hat a simple cable hat knit in the round is great for cable beginners the use of bulky yarn allows for the hat to be completed quickly and gives a soft and cozy texture the high crown and blunt top makes for a good place for a pompom to be seated size adult circumference 20 - 24 50 8 - 71 cm length 9 22 8 cm materials bulky weight yarn approximately 120 - 137 yards 80 - 100 grams size 9 5 5 mm and 10 5 6 5 mm dpns tapestry needle pompom optional gauge 14 stitches and 20 row = 4 10 cm in stockinette with larger needles adjust needle size to obtain gauge or increase needle size for larger hat decrease needle size for smaller hat abbreviations dpns = double point needles pm = place marker k = knit p = purl c6f = move next 3 stitches to cable needle and hold in front knit next 3 stitches on needle in left hand move 3 on cable needle back to needle in left hand knit 3 k2tog = knit 2 together p2tog = purl 2 together s�ay kni�� 2 pattern ribbing -cast on 72 with smaller needles and join for working in the round being careful not to twist stitches pm *p3 k2 p2 k2* repeat *-* to end continue working pattern until work measures 2 5 6 3 cm from cast on edge begin cables switch to larger needle size rounds 1-7 *p3 k6* repeat *-* to end a total of 8 times round 8 *purl 3 c6f* repeat *-* to end a total of 8 times -repeat rounds 1-8 for a total of 4 times decrease for crown -repeat rounds 1-2 from above 1 time each 72 stitches -*p2tog k2tog x 3 p2tog x 2 k2tog x 3* repeat *-* a total of 4 times 36 stitches -*k2tog x 2 p2tog k2tog p2tog k2tog p2tog k2tog x 2* repeat *-* a total of 2 times 18 stitches -k2tog x 9 9 stitches -cut yarn and leave a long tail thread tapestry needle and pull thread through remaining 9 stitches -secure and weave in all ends a pompom can be added if desired s�ay kni�� 3 i hope you have enjoyed this pattern if you have any questions or comments they can be sent to sjayknits@gmail com s�ay kni�� 4
